tests.conftest.create_test_network

tests.conftest.create_test_network()[source]

Create an instance of :class: ~yawning_titan.networks.network.Network from a dictionary.

If the dictionary is in legacy format then perform preprocessing, otherwise utilise the :method: ~yawning_titan.networks.network.Network.create method.
